summary: Wanderers Nook is a small-medium sized home suited to the solo player located outside of Windhelm. It contains all the regular crafting workbenches and storage space expected in a home.
descriptionHtml:
***** UPDATE 01/06/2014 *****
A recent comment posted on this mod prompted me to log in to let people know that I am no longer supporting this mod. Anyone who wishes to change/update this mod is welcome to do so, my only request is that I be given credit as original author if the mod is uploaded elsewhere :)


Wanderer's Nook is a 6 room player home located in the northeastern exterior battlement wall of Windhelm. This mod is suited to the solo player, however is fully navmeshed to be spouse/companion friendly and includes a map marker for fast travel.
The home is comprised of a kitchen with food storage and cooking facilities, an alchemy and enchanting room, blacksmithing room, study/library, bedroom and finally, a spa/sauna for the travel weary adventurer.
All containers are safe for storage.

Wanderer's Nook also contains the following:
- 8 mannequins
- 6 large weapon display cases
- 5 small weapon display cases
- 4 shield plaques
- 3 weapon plaques
- 17 weapon racks
- 6 bookshelves
- 10 shrines (including Nocturnal)
- 13 standing stones

Please note - This mod contains mostly static items (ie cannot be picked up) as it was made to please my own aesthetics, rather than be filled with lots of "free stuff"

Wanderer's Nook uses multiple new meshes/textures created by many talented modders which I have included in the download file. A HUGE thankyou to these people!
The mods used are listed as follows:
Artisanix - Paintings and Frames http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423
yourenotsupposedtobeinhere - Rug Resource http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17303
Oaristys - Modders Resource Pack http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525
Blarys - PotionShelf Resource http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14136 and OpenBooks Resource http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134
NOTE - you are not required to download these separately as I have included them in the file

The following mods are highly recommended but NOT required to use this mod:
Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652
Unlimited Bookshelves http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10891
Spouses Can Live Everywhere http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370
Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons HD http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18799
Unique Booze Bottles HD http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19922

NOTE - the mod author of Potions and Poisons and Booze Bottles also has files combining both the Potions/Poisons and the Booze bottles to save downloading 2 different mods. I have used Radiant and Unique Potions Poisons and BOOZE v2 GLOWING VERSION.

Known bugs/issues
None that I know of, however other mods located in the exact same place may well cause conflicts with this mod.

BUG UPDATE 18/07/12 1. Painting frames are not appearing in the correct colours, a patch file and also an updated main file will be uploaded later today
BUG UPDATE 18/07/12 2. Uploaded 2 new files, Painting frame patch file (this includes the missing frame textures if you downloaded v1.0), and the second is Wanderer's Nook v2 which is the latest whole file downloaded including the missing textures - the patch file is NOT required with v2


Installation
The easiest option is to just download with Nexus Mod Manager http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/

Thanks to rickyrickylo for creating the following video of this mod [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7DqwP49ijM] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T7DqwP49ijM[/url]
author: Jottaca
